entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
